context.p: Change the new view to a table view:

step.info: As you move inside the workspace the mouse pointer changes to the table view icon (Linux shows a hand icon). After you click, the new table view replaces the notepad view. Because a query has never been associated with this view, no data is displayed in the table. You will need to select a query from the Properties editor.

step.cmd: When a message asks you to assign the query now, click No.

taskbody.postreq:
Now add a message log view to the original notepad view:
Click Message Log.
Click inside the notepad view.
The message log replaces the notepad view.
If you select the wrong view or change your mind about the view you chose, press Escape or click somewhere in the toolbar.
